text:
Mar Emmanuel III Delly (26 October 1927 – 8 April 2014) was an Iraqi Catholic leader. He was the Patriarch Emeritus of Babylon of the Chaldeans and former Primate of the Chaldean Catholic Church. His name in Arabic is. In Syriac it is. He was born in Tel Keppe.
Delly died on 8 April 2014 at a hospital in San Diego, California in the United States. He was 86 years old.

annotations.surface_form: Patriarch Emeritus of Babylon of the Chaldeans
